page.title: 13The Fair
page.content:
Traylens Fair ususally comes from the 20th to the 23rd of June. It comes to represent the{Marlow Regatta,}so really it is second in importance to the Regatta but the children do not think so.
You can buy fluffy pink candy floss, lovely sticky sugar dummies and hot hot dogs. There are rides like the spinning dive bombers, rising umbrella carriages, whizzing spinning eggs, jumping cars, mixers, waltzers and a sickening Galaxy ride!
Higginson Park normally seems small, but when it is crammed with stalls and Regatta tents, you realise, on walking through the park gates just how big it is. I never see the rowing - but the fair is great fun!
